headline.main: Hope in a Bottle: The Billion-Dollar Baldness Race

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: PEDDLERS have been seeking baldness cures about as long as alchemists tried to turn base metals into gold. But while the alchemists gave up some time ago, the anti-baldness forces now seem to be hitting their stride.
docs.snippet: LEAD: PEDDLERS have been seeking baldness cures about as long as alchemists tried to turn base metals into gold. But while the alchemists gave up some time ago, the anti-baldness forces now seem to be hitting their stride.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The dog that frisked its way through so many years of your life is not eager to play anymore. And the cat seems to spend more time than ever sleeping.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The dog that frisked its way through so many years of your life is not eager to play anymore. And the cat seems to spend more time than ever sleeping.
